title: Why can't I get free robux? - Quora

response.answer_text: (—____—) Did you really ask that? Fine, I’ll answer… You can’t get free robux because Roblox corporation needs money to support Roblox, the game. If everyone got free robux with no other kind of microtransactions, Roblox corporation will go bankrupt or worse… in debt (if they’re not already)! You have to understand that the people in R.C. need your money so Roblox can be played for many years to come. I mean come on, most of the stuff you get are free anyway like: -T- shirts, shirts, pants, hats, etc. -Audio -Admin (in free admin games) -Games Honestly, you don’t need more clothes or gamepasses to have a good time, cherish what you already have! Technically though, builder’s club gives free robux, but you need to pay… so yeah.

You can. Some groups offer giveaways, I know some people who got Robux with that method. However, avoid online sites that offer free Robux, even free Robux apps if they ask for your password. The most safe and easy way in my opinion to get ‘free Robux’ is to join groups that offer giveaways but don’t have too many members in them, which increases your chances of getting Robux. Thanks for reading, cheers!
